alert.note: Alert for Orange; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:56PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Seminole and northwestern Orange Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Apopka. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Apopka, Altamonte Springs, Ocoee and Maitland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
